verses.name: Matthew 28:1
verses.text: In the end of the sabbath, as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week, came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre.

verses.name: Matthew 28:2
verses.text: And, behold, there was a great earthquake: for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven, and came and rolled back the stone from the door, and sat upon it.

verses.name: Matthew 28:3
verses.text: His countenance was like lightning, and his raiment white as snow:

verses.name: Matthew 28:4
verses.text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake, and became as dead men.
